reviews.review:
Now this is a good Marvel movie; much better than Black Panther was, one clear cut great villain with a developed personality, good comedy without forcing it, great cameos and epic returns for two of the three original Avengers. Also the action was great.
But of course the critics ignore a good story in a movie since it doesn't have a liberal agenda
It wanted to have a pathos, but the movie didn't have a lot of it...

Forget the story, this is the blockbuster of blockbusters! The alpha and omega, the beginning and the end, the lion of tribe of judah! Story lovers may not have enjoyed it but what you'll see in that cinema must at least be a once in a lifetime experience. In the sense, the ending is actually rapture itself.

I was surprised how much I liked this film, and was able to follow the plot, after 10 years of Marvel movies. It is definitely the best of the "Avengers" films, which I feel are a too stuffed with characters. I prefer the movies centered around one central hero. This one has an interesting plot, and some great action set pieces. Humorous moments.

My main quibble: I had some major issues with the ending, and rolled my eyes quite a bit. Can't say anymore about that.

There's also a lack of conflict, with all of these super heroes/villains constantly beating the shit out of each other, and the fact that anyone who is killed can come back at any time, or people can't even be hurt. It is much like watching a video game. 

When I look at other franchise films, I'm able to get emotionally involved when a character might *actually* die, such as in "Star Wars," "James Bond," or "The Lord of the Rings," for example.
That ending ðŸ˜­. What else needs to be said?

10 years in the making and Marvel hits a HUGE homerun with a movie jam packed with action from beginning to end, one of the greatest villains in cinematic history, belly laughs throughout, and an ending that left everyone in the theater with their mouths on the ground. A Must See for any superhero fan.
This movie is an A+ , 10/10. The Russos did a great job. The Highlight of the year so far.
It was entertaining,  funny and quite thrilling
Absolutely fantastic and it's definitely Thanos' movie.
